page.title: 10HOBBIES
page.content:
My favourite hobbies are swimming and watching television.
{SWIMMING I am quite good at swimming but I cannot do the breaststroke.Our local baths are called Adwick Leisure Centre and St.James.I usually go with a friend.I have a badge for swimming a length and two certificates.
{TELEVISION I like watching comedy acts and detective programmes.The comedy is good because there is sometimes violence and also new jokes.Some of the comedy acts are made to look real. The detective programmes are really good because I like the way they search for clues and solve the mysteries.
